querys.query: SELECT distinct m.* FROM ${memberTable} m,${memberRoleTable} v WHERE m.id=v.uid AND v.roleId=${roleId.quote()} AND m.congealType=0 ORDER BY m.createDate DESC
SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT distinct m.* FROM ${memberTable} m,${memberRoleTable} v WHERE m.id=v.uid AND v.roleId=${roleId.quote()} AND m.congealType=0 ) z
